attributes.action: stop paying the banks large bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the banks have made a real mess of things, and they are wanting to give high wages and bonuses to people like Northern Rock this should not be allowed to happen. We the tax payers have bailed them out, not to give them big payouts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
